attributes.action: A stolen animal has to be returned to its microchip owner
attributes.additional_details:
Microchip
Pictures in previous Home
Show certificates and GCCF registered number
Offspring
Vets bills / inoculation and neutering
attributes.background:
Our cat went missing 8 months ago and a lack of knowledge by the person who took him asked CPL to see if he was entire 
The CPL CHECKED for chip first and found Cat registered to different address. Person is refusing to return Cat when owner turned up. Police won’t enforce. We can’t get him home

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
